attributes.action: Ensure equal energy crisis financial support for care or residential homes
attributes.additional_details: Residents of care or residential homes deserve the same support as standard households. Otherwise the increases in energy costs will end up being unfairly passed through to the residents and their families
attributes.background: Ensure that the proposed government support for domestic energy bill payers is matched for care or residential homes. This would come in the form of deferred payments above a specific price cap for electricity and gas

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has announced support for businesses with energy costs. You can find out more here

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-energy-price-guarantee-for-families-and-businesses-while-urgently-taking-action-to-reform-broken-energy-market
